dashboard.welcomeMessage: Select a tool or check your recent activity
dashboard.apiDescription: Use your API key to access the PDF Editor API programmatically
dashboard.apiKeyHint: Keep this key secret and secure

apiDocs.title: API Documentation
apiDocs.description: This page provides documentation for both backend and Python service APIs. You can use these APIs to integrate PDF editing capabilities into your own applications.

userGuide.title: User Guide
userGuide.introText: PDF Editor is a web application that allows you to manipulate PDF files in various ways. This guide explains how to use the application and its features.
userGuide.gettingStartedText: To use the PDF Editor, you need to sign in with your account. If you don't have an account, you can register for free.
userGuide.apiUsageText: You can also use our API to integrate PDF editing capabilities into your own applications. See the API Documentation for more details.
userGuide.commonIssuesText: This section covers common issues you might encounter while using the PDF Editor and how to resolve them.

pdf.toolSubtitle: Select a tool to start editing your PDF documents
pdf.mergePdfDesc: Combine multiple PDF files into one document
pdf.rotatePdfDesc: Rotate pages in your PDF document
pdf.splitPdfDesc: Split a PDF document into multiple files
pdf.watermarkPdfDesc: Add text or image watermark to your PDF
pdf.pdfToImageDesc: Convert PDF pages to image files
pdf.deletePagesDesc: Remove pages from your PDF document
pdf.editMetadataDesc: Edit title, author and other PDF properties
pdf.protectPdfDesc: Add password protection to your PDF
pdf.dropFilesHere: Drop files here or click to browse
pdf.needMinTwoFiles: You need to select at least two PDF files
pdf.title: Title
pdf.author: Author
pdf.subject: Subject
pdf.editTextDesc: Modify text content in your PDF document
pdf.addTocDesc: Create clickable bookmarks and table of contents in your PDF
pdf.extractImagesDesc: Extract embedded images from your PDF document
pdf.textEditsApplied: Text edits have been applied to the PDF
pdf.editTextNote: Note: Text editing in PDF is limited. Complex formatting may not be preserved.
pdf.tocAdded: Table of contents has been added to the PDF
pdf.tocInfo: The table of contents adds bookmarks that are visible when opening the PDF in a viewer. Each entry links to the corresponding page.
pdf.createZipFile: Create ZIP file for multiple images
pdf.extractImagesInfo: This tool will extract all embedded images from the PDF file. Image quality depends on how the images were originally embedded in the PDF.
pdf.imagesExtracted: Successfully extracted {count} images from the PDF

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address
validation.pageRange: Page number must be between 1 and {max}
validation.startEndOrder: Start page must be less than or equal to end page
validation.invalidPages: Invalid page numbers: {pages}. Max page is {max}
